title: Moving statics
brief_description: An attempt to transfer the abstract kinetic art of the Dutch mime, Will Spoor, to the screen, using techniques of animation, superimposition, and film speed and exposure changes to create new patterns of body movement. Made in London, 1969. Commentary by Will Spoor.
